headline.main: Diets Make You Fatter, and for Good Reasons

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: We are not at all surprised by the increasing obesity rates reported in "Despite Awareness of Risks, More in U.S. Are Getting Fat" (front page, July 17). The experts cited blame our abundant food supply, food advertising, our television watching and the growth of the anti-diet movement.
